title: musechain
author: musechain
content: Hi all,We are Musechain, a hot wallet, "learn & earn" and marketplace in one mobile application.We aim to bring together traditional curations from museums, brands and artists into the NFT space, while we create one simple-to-use application to appeal to mass market.We are currently starting the Pioneer Drop, where the NFTs give out bi-annual SOL (alt coin solana) reward, tied to the performance of our platform. Crucially, they are FREE to obtain. Just download the app, participate in the "learn & earn" and referral activities to earn lottery tickets to get a chance at earning FREE NFTs.The first raffle would be held the coming weekend!For more information, please visit: https://musechain.org/linkHave fun earning your FREE NFTs,Musechain Team
